name: The Over-Correction
writer: Carter Bays (creator), Craig Thomas (creator), Craig Gerard, Matthew Zinman, Craig Gerard (executive story editor), Matthew Zinman (executive story editor), Daniel Gregor (executive story editor), Doug Mand (executive story editor)
actors: Josh Radnor, Jason Segel, Cobie Smulders, Neil Patrick Harris
plot: Robin tries to get Barney's "Playbook" out of jealousy over his new girlfriend, Marshall catches his mom having sex with Lily's dad, and Ted tries to get everything back that was borrowed from him and never returned.
